#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef unsigned long long int ll;
#define F(i,a,b) for(int i = (int)(a); i <= (int)(b); i++)
#define RF(i,a,b) for(int i = (int)(a); i >= (int)(b); i--)

int main()
{
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
        freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
        freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
    #endif
    int N,_i,_j,C = 0;
    ll K;
    scanf("%d%llu",&N,&K);
    ll H[N];
    F(i,0,N-1) scanf("%llu",&H[i]);
    sort(H,H+N);
    for(_i = 0, _j = N-1; _i < _j;)
    {
        if(H[_i] + H[_j] == K)
        {
            C++;
            _i++;
            _j--;
        }
        else if(H[_i] + H[_j] < K) _i++;
        else _j--;
    }
    if(C >= 1) printf("Yes");
    else printf("No");

    return 0;
}
